item.title: Web Skills Crash Course
item.description: HTML and CSS In past synchronous semesters, this course had several class periods covering the basics of HTML and CSS. Knowing these markup languages (not considered programming languages) is very important for being a good web developer. Both HTML and CSS are straightforward and well documented. Since many of you have some experience with HTML and CSS, this component of the class is going to be self directed. Other langauges and platforms and frameworks change very rapidly and you will, as a web developer, spend a career learning new languages and platforms and frameworks.
